content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


At least one round of NeXpose scanning should performed. However, two rounds should be performed as time allows. Please use the "NetSPI Standard - no web" profile. Please refer to the instructions for the detailed Nessus settings if needed.

Variation: NeXpose Console


1. Log into https://nexpose.netspi.com with your NeXpose application credentials.

2. Create and run the scan using the "NetSPI Standard - no web" profile.

3. Run the scan twice (when possible)

4. Export both result sets using the xml type 2 format.

5. Import the result into Resolve
